attributes.action: Bring the new Route master to Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Manchester public transport system needs serious improvements.

Manchester and the Trafford centre need a quick link bus.

Too many people use the buses that go to and from Manchester/Trafford centre for the full journey rather than the small stops in between.

There for I suggest that we get at least 12 of the new route masters to create an express link between Manchester and the Trafford centre stopping at few stops in between. This will reduce congestion and create a fast connection for those who wish to commute between the two very busy places.

rejection.details: Please provide your full name on your petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
